author: Patrick Mayer
title: Deutsche Schulen: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter offenbaren â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤nde"
text:
Deutsche Schulen: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter offenbaren â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤ndeâ€œ
Eine Sprecherin der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz beschreibt bei Ippen.Media, woran es in Deutschlands Schulen fehlt - samt Forderungen an Kanzler Friedrich Merz.
Berlin - Am Dienstag (24. Juni) war es so weit. Die schwarz-rote Bundesregierung aus CDU/CSU und SPD hat ihren Entwurf fÃ¼r den Bundeshaushalt 2025 vorgelegt. Darin sind im Umfeld von Ukraine-Krieg und Russland-Aggression nicht zuletzt immense Verteidigungsausgaben zur AufrÃ¼stung der Bundeswehr enthalten.
Schulen in Deutschland: Thema Bildung ging im Bundestagswahlkampf unter
Bis zu 95 Milliarden Euro sollen in die deutschen StreitkrÃ¤fte flieÃŸen. Die Verteidigungspolitik war schlieÃŸlich auch ein zentrales Thema im Wahlkampf zur Bundestagswahl 2025. Ganz im Gegensatz zur Bildung allgemein und zu Schulen im Speziellen. Dabei wird seit Jahren Ã¼ber eklatante VersÃ¤umnisse in der Ausstattung deutscher Bildungseinrichtungen berichtet.
Zum Beispiel, was ausreichend und zeitgemÃ¤ÃŸe digitale GerÃ¤te angeht. Im Umfeld von Bundeshaushalt und schwarz-roten PlÃ¤nen fÃ¼r Deutschland hat die Sprecherin der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz auf Anfrage der Frankfurter Rundschau von Ippen.Media jetzt â€žgravierende MissstÃ¤ndeâ€œ benannt. Sie stellt eindringliche Forderungen an die Koalition von Bundeskanzler Friedrich Merz (CDU) und Bundesfinanzminister Lars Klingbeil (SPD).
Bildung in Deutschland: Expertin berichtet von MissstÃ¤nden an deutschen Schulen
â€žDie MissstÃ¤nde an deutschen Schulen sind vielerorts gravierend und sie ziehen sich durch nahezu alle Bereiche: Vom akuten LehrkrÃ¤ftemangel, Ã¼ber unzureichende digitale Infrastruktur bis hin zu baulichen MÃ¤ngeln, die zum Teil gesundheitsgefÃ¤hrdend sind. Es ist keine Ausnahme, sondern bittere RealitÃ¤t, dass SchÃ¼lerinnen und SchÃ¼ler in RÃ¤umen mit Schimmelbefall, undichten Fenstern und defekten BÃ¶den unterrichtet werdenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rt Tilda Skerra: â€žWenn Ã¼berhaupt LehrkrÃ¤fte zur VerfÃ¼gung stehenâ€œ. Digitale EndgerÃ¤te wÃ¼rden ebenso fehlen wie stabiles WLAN oder zeitgemÃ¤ÃŸe Lernumgebungen, schildert sie.
Skerra ist Mitglied im Bundessekretariat der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz (BSK), die sich als Vertretung von SchÃ¼lerinnen und SchÃ¼lern der Bildungspolitik in Deutschland annimmt. Und zwar bei Themen von Ã¼berregionaler Bedeutung. So soll Anliegen von SchÃ¼lern und SchÃ¼lerinnen bundesweit GehÃ¶r verschafft werden, wÃ¤hrend fÃ¼r das Thema Bildung im deutschen FÃ¶deralismus vorrangig die BundeslÃ¤nder zustÃ¤ndig sind.
Es ist keine Ausnahme, sondern bittere RealitÃ¤t, dass SchÃ¼ler*innen in RÃ¤umen mit Schimmelbefall, undichten Fenstern und defekten BÃ¶den unterrichtet werden.
Denn: Die Kulturhoheit der LÃ¤nder im Bildungsbereich ist im Grundgesetz verankert. Der Bund nimmt durch FÃ¶rdermittel und Subventionen, etwa bei Bauvorhaben, aber sehr wohl groÃŸen Einfluss auf die Bildungspolitik und kann die LÃ¤nder, je nach Gewichtung des Themas, bei der Budgetierung erheblich entlasten - oder eben nicht.
SondervermÃ¶gen der schwarz-roten Koalition: SchÃ¼ler-Vertreter fordern viel mehr Geld von Merz
Nach Ansicht von Skerra und ihrer Mitstreiter kommen aus Berlin zu wenige Signale und vor allem zu wenig Geld, um frÃ¼here VersÃ¤umnisse anzugehen und bestenfalls zu beheben. â€žWir fordern, dass mindestens zehn Prozent des geplanten Infrastruktur-SondervermÃ¶gens, also rund 50 Milliarden Euro, zweckgebunden in die Sanierung und Modernisierung von Schulen investiert werdenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rt Skerra unserer Redaktion: â€žDarÃ¼ber hinaus braucht es ein langfristig angelegtes FÃ¶rderprogramm, das die bauliche, digitale und strukturelle Weiterentwicklung unserer Schulen strategisch begleitet.â€œ
Ferner mÃ¼sse der schon unter der frÃ¼heren Ampel-Bundesregierung so bezeichnete â€žDigitalPakt deutlich aufgestockt und ausgebaut werden, um Bildung endlich nachhaltig im 21. Jahrhundert ankommen zu lassenâ€œ, meint die Expertin. Zu weiteren Forderungen der BundesschÃ¼lerkonferenz gehÃ¶rt die Finanzierung verpflichtender Fort- und Weiterbildungsangebote fÃ¼r LehrkrÃ¤fte, was etwa die Themen â€žmentale Gesundheitâ€œ und â€ždigitale Lehrformateâ€œ betreffe. Und ein realistischer BetreuungsschlÃ¼ssel, wie es die BSK-Sprecherin beschreibt: â€žMindestens eine Schulsozialarbeiterin oder ein Schulsozialarbeiter auf 300 SchÃ¼ler*innen und auf 150 SchÃ¼ler*innen eine Schulpsychologin oder ein Schulpsychologe je Bundesland.â€œ
Lars Klingbeil stellt Bundeshaushalt 2025 vor: Bildungsausgaben steigen leicht
Das alles gebe es bislang nicht. Die Investitionen in die Bildung, die Vize-Kanzler Klingbeil mit dem Bundeshaushalt 2025 vorstellte, dÃ¼rften bei den Experten aus dem Bereich jedoch nur fÃ¼r Ã¼berschaubare Begeisterung sorgen. Laut Website des Bundesfinanzministeriums entfallen von 488,60 Milliarden Euro aus dem Regierungsentwurf gerade mal 4,57 Prozent auf die Themen Bildung und Forschung - rund 22,31 Milliarden Euro.
Das ist ein leichter Anstieg. Zum Vergleich: Die gescheiterte Ampel-Bundesregierung hatte fÃ¼r 2024 noch 21,49 Milliarden Euro eingeplant. Laut Bundesfinanzministerium sollen aus dem SondervermÃ¶gen zudem insgesamt 6,5 Milliarden Euro in Investitionen in die Kindertagesbetreuung und in die digitale Bildung flieÃŸen. In einem Zeitraum bis 2029. Von den geforderten 50 Milliarden Euro der BSK ist das weit entfernt. (pm)

author: Press Association
title: Three men die after 4Ã—4 recovered from river - The Courier
text:
Three men die after 4Ã—4 recovered from river By Press Association December 28 2023, 6.03pm Share Three men die after 4Ã—4 recovered from river Share via Facebook Twitter Linkedin Whatsapp Messenger Email Post link https://www.thecourier.co.uk/news/uk-world/4852802/three-men-die-after-4x4-recovered-from-river/ Copy Link (Dave Thompson/PA)
Three men have died after a 4Ã—4 vehicle was recovered from a river on the North York Moors, police said.
Emergency services including police, ambulance and air support attended a location on the River Esk near Glaisdale shortly before midday on Thursday.
A 4Ã—4 was recovered from the river by the fire service just after 3pm and three men found inside have died, North Yorkshire Police said.
Another man who attempted to help those in the vehicle was pulled to safety from the river and has been receiving medical treatment.
Emergency services have been dealing with a serious incident on Thursday (28 December) involving a 4Ã—4 vehicle in the River Esk near Glaisdale on the North York Moors ðŸš¨
Three men sadly died at the scene.
More information is available here â¬‡ï¸ https://t.co/KgxPhHATO4 pic.twitter.com/AvDT3TiqCk
â€” North Yorkshire Police (@NYorksPolice) December 28, 2023
A police spokesperson advised people to travel with care after the â€œtragic incidentâ€.
It comes after Storm Gerrit caused flooding and travel chaos across the country throughout Wednesday and Thursday.
The spokesperson said: â€œLocalised conditions across our area are making driving hazardous.
â€œRoads are particularly badly affected around the River Esk, to the north of the county, as we have seen with the tragic incident near Glaisdale.
â€œThere was another incident at nearby Houlsyke at 12.49pm when a car got stuck in flood water and another at Kirby Wiske in Hambleton at 2.35pm.
â€œThankfully, the occupants of both vehicles were brought to safety.
â€œThe key advice is to consider whether your journey is necessary.
â€œPlease avoid driving through any kind of standing or moving flood water if you possibly can.â€
Witnesses to the incident are urged to call North Yorkshire Police on 101, option 4, quoting reference NYP-28122023-0146.

author: Lewis Nyaundi
title: Education CS silent as teachers, lecturers threaten to strike - The Standard
text:
Home Education Education CS silent as teachers, lecturers threaten to strike By Lewis Nyaundi | 20m ago Education Cabinet Secretary Julius Migosi when he was sworn in as the CS. [PCS] The newly appointed Education Cabinet Secretary Julius Migos is on the spot as crisis looms in the sector.
The two teachers' unions have called a nationwide strike when schools open for the third term in one week while university workers have also threatened to down tools in September.
The twin threats by sector players pose a threat to the smooth running of the education calendar but Migos has remained mum even as the unions dig in.
On Thursday, the Kenya Union of Post-Primary Education Teachers (Kuppet) issued a seven-day strike notice, which could result in shut down of schools for the third term.
The lapse of the strike notice coincides with the school opening scheduled for August 26. . Keep Reading Teacher unions now reach out to Labour CS amid looming strike Listen to teachers to avert a looming learning disruption Government warns CSs against divided loyalty Teachers threaten to go on strike in two weeks
Kenya National Union of Teachers (Knut) is expected to also formally issue a strike notice Friday.
The teacher's unions have listed several grievances and they have also roped in Labour Cabinet Secretary Alfred Mutua.
In a petition to Dr Mutua, Kuppet and Knut listed the plight of Junior Secondary School teachers (JSS), increased salaries as outlined in the collective agreement (CBA) and employment of additional teachers.
The unions last week jointly outlined grievances they want to be resolved before returning to class.
These include salary increases, improved working conditions, and the implementation of the Collective Bargaining Agreement (CBA).
The impending strike poses a threat to the school calendar and will be the third major disruption to schools this year, following floods and anti-government protests.
But even as pressure mounts, Migos remains quiet.
â€œThe CS comes to the ministry when we have very many issues, but the buck stops with him and we call upon him to work with the employer TSC to look into the issues raised,â€ Kuppet Secretary General Akello Misori said.
Misori said that the union has given the Teachers Service Commission (TSC) seven days to resolve the issues raised. Stay informed. Subscribe to our newsletter
By clicking on the SIGN UP button, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and the Privacy Policy SIGN UP
The University Academic Staff Union (Uasu), issued a strike notice on Wednesday, citing concerns over job security and working conditions. Stay Informed, Stay Empowered: Download the Standard ePaper App!
With schools and universities set to reopen in the coming weeks, the CS must address the grievances to prevent a shutdown of the basic and higher education institutions.
The strike threats also pose a significant challenge to Migos, who must find a way to balance the demands of the teachers' unions with the government's financial constraints and the needs of students.
With a week left to reopen schools and a fortnight to reopen universities, the CS faces his first major challenge in the education sector.
Misori on Thursday said that the unionâ€™s irreducible minimums include the immediate employment of intern teachers on permanent and pensionable terms effective 1 July 2024 and the recruitment of 20,000 teachers to address the huge deficit in JSS.
He revealed that the union will push for a post-graduate allowance for teachers who are holders of Masterâ€™s and PhD degrees irrespective of their positions in service."
If teachers make good their strike threat, it could have far-reaching consequences for students preparing for national examinations and assessments.
Kuppet and Knut have also accused TSC of failing to implement salary increments as agreed upon in the 2021-2025 CBA.
The unions have raised concerns over the teachers' medical coverage, the lack of progress in negotiations for a new CBA, and the government's failure to address the shortage of teachers in JSS. Related Topics Teachers Strike TSC-Teachers Standoff Education Cabinet Secretary Julius Migos Education Crisis Share this article . The Standard Insider By Irene Githinji 21 mins ago Premium Kalonzo: Uhuru will soon call Azimio meeting By Jacinta Mutura 21 mins ago Premium KICD apologises for misleading content in Biology textbook By Stephen Rutto 21 mins ago Premium Eldoret city forced to pull down 'embarrassing' statues amid public backlash By Ndungâ€™u Gachane 3 hrs ago Premium Uhuru silent as top politicians invoke his name for own good . author: Briana Viser
title: Woman Leaves Husband After He Expects Her to Be a Mother When They Agreed on Having No Children - CheezCake - Parenting | Relationships | Food | Lifestyle
text: Welcome back ladies and gentlemen of the internet. When it comes to having children, it's everyone's individual prerogative whether they want to or not. [No one can force them against their will, ](https://cheezburger.com/35898885)or decide for them. As a society, people like to put women in a box as being 'maternal,' expecting that due to their gender, they will automatically want to be a mother. This is so far from true. In this particular Reddit piece, the couple decides before marriage [ that they don't want children](https://cheezburger.com/35701509). The husband's sister ends up abandoning her three young children. As tragic as this is, I understand the sister-in-law for not wanting to take them in and [ commit to being a mother the rest of her lif](https://cheezburger.com/36092677)e. They help for a while, but eventually she can't do it anymore. She tells her husband she wants a divorce, or the kids are gone. Well, he doesn't handle it well, and pressures her into changing her entire life trajectory. Like what you see? Find more hilarious women's memes and crazy stories on our Instagram [@Cheezcake_Humor](https://www.instagram.com/cheezcake_humor/) and more videos on our TikTok @ [cheezcaked](https://www.tiktok.com/@cheezcaked)

author: Interwire
title: CBN Gummies To Improve Sleep Quality: Natural Restful Sleep Solutions Announced
text:
â€”
The recently released, all-natural sleep aids harness the sleep-enhancing benefits of CBN (cannabinol) in combination with CBD (cannabidiol). Together, the two compounds work synergistically to promote deep, restful sleep and relaxation. The gummies support the bodyâ€™s natural sleep mechanisms for refreshing and rejuvenating rest and a better start to the day upon waking.
More details are available at
https://www.thetrustedlab.com/product/good-night-cbn-gummies-150-mg/
Each gummy is carefully crafted from high-quality, lab-tested, organic, gluten-free ingredients and contains five milligrams of fast-acting CBN. One jar of Good Night CBN Gummies contains 30 pieces for a total of 150 milligrams of CBN, The Trusted Lab says.
According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), one-third of adults report they often donâ€™t get enough sleep to be at their best the next day. Such a high proportion of sleep-deprived adults suggests natural sleep remedies would be welcome on the market.
The Trusted Labâ€™s Good Night CBN Gummies may be a superior alternative to melatonin-containing sleep aids. For some consumers, these supplements may have side effects such as headaches, nausea, and dizziness, and some users may develop dependency on them.
The company recommends users take one or two gummies with food just before bed and allow 15 minutes for maximum absorption. They also note that users should always listen to their bodies and adjust the dosage accordingly. The gummies are made from the highest-quality CBN concentrate, ensuring high absorption and bio-availability.
About The Trusted Lab
The Trusted Lab crafts premium, hemp-derived CBD products for better health, relaxation, and performance. The manufacturing process is completely controlled by the company to ensure productsâ€™ maximum purity and potency. All products contain no more than 0.3% THC (tetrahydrocannabinol) and are independently third-party tested.
â€œThe Trusted Lab was founded to provide you the highest-quality, organic, natural, lab-tested, and safe American-grown hemp CBD products in the market today,â€ a company representative said. â€œOur powerful tinctures, edibles, and topical creams are the result of months of research and development, leading to top-of-the-line products for each of our categories. Every single product on our website has been tested for potency, quality and consumer tested.â€
Interested parties can learn more at
https://www.thetrustedlab.com/product/good-night-cbn-gummies-150-mg/
